headline: Entergy recognized as Civic 50 Honoree for the 10th consecutive year
summary: Entergy has been recognized as a 2025 honoree of The Civic 50, a prestigious recognition by Points of Light that highlights the top companies in the United States leading the way in employee volunteerism and community investment. This marks the 10th consecutive year that Entergy has received this significant honor.

headline: Raymond James Initiates Coverage of Entergy (ETR)
summary: Entergy Corporation (NYSE:ETR) is counted among the Best Nuclear Energy Stocks to Buy Right Now. The stock has surged by more than 54% over the last year, putting it on the radar of several analysts. It was recently reported that Raymond James analyst J.R. Weston has initiated coverage of ETR with a Market Perform rating. […]
